document_data.name: Blue Feather
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blue Feather''' were a [[lizardfolk]] tribe in the [[Lizard Marsh]] who wore belts and [[Bandolier|baldrics]] decorated with blue feathers.
document_data.Possessions: The leader of one band of Blue Feather lizardfolk possessed an ''[[amulet of ceratosaur summoning and control]]'' that allowed them to bring nearby [[ceratosaur]]s to their aid.
document_data.Relationships: Tensions arose between [[Redeye]] and the Blue Feather Clan when the Blue Feathers' raids drew scrutiny from the [[Daggerford militia]].
document_data.History: Around the {{YearlinkName|1357}}, the Blue Feather Clan raided [[Cromm's Hold]] while Baron Cromm and his men were out hunting. The lizardfolk slaughtered most of the hold's occupants, looted household items, and set the tower ablaze, resulting in its partial collapse.
